title: FS: T206 Green Cobb SGC 40 Sold
author: wondo

posts.post_title: FS: T206 Green Cobb SGC 40 Sold
posts.post_content:
Sharp for grade examples of the Bat On and the Green Cobbs.  The trend is certainly upwards for cards that present well.

Bat on: $SOLD
Green: $SOLD

I will also consider trades involving T202 Cobbs.  Thank you.

John Wondowski
[url]jwondowski@aol.com[/url]

Since I missed these earlier today (as I am sure many had)... sure wish I knew what they went for, so I could kick myself for playing golf today...

:D
Damn me too. Would love to have had the Bat On!  Great cards
